hey there people who will read this my name is akasha brown. my nickname is deejay. don't ask me how i got that cing as my name is akasha jayne brown. i am 16 years old and i am in yr 10. (high school). i love reading and surfing the net and watching tv/movies. my fav serieses are harry potter and deltora quest (1,2,3) and of course artemis fowl. i am currently reading harry potter and the chamber of secrets for like the 2rd or 3rd time and deltora quest 3-dragons nest. my fav movies are troy, harry potter (all 3), 2 fast 2 furious, the fast and the furious, pirates of the caribbean, lord of the rings (all 3), the mummy and the mummy returns. my fav actors are orlando bloom, eric banna, tom felton, daniel radcliffe, billy boyd, dominic monaghan and sean astin. my fav food would most likely be pizza and chocolate moose.and my fav drinks would have to be lemon aid and diet coke. there will be contests and piccies on here so keep a sharp eye open. also there will be questions about urself....... well must go deejay ps. there must always b a ps. (tradition) pps. my fav colour is green and i am single (almost)
